assistant_text: The wooden thing is a cutting board being used to chop and prepare vegetables and tofu.
I see carrots, celery, green beans, broccoli, and possibly some leafy greens on the cutting board.
The bottle with the cream cap appears to be a jar of peanut butter or a similar spread.
The main focus of this view is a zebra standing in the dry, wooded area with another zebra partially visible in the background.
The trees in the background appear to be dry, thorny acacia trees.
